text: Aquicoccus is a Gram-negative and aerobic genus of bacteria from the family of Rhodobacteraceae with one known species (Aquicoccus porphyridii). Aquicoccus porphyridii has been isolated from the alga Porphyridium marinum from Korea. ==References== Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Aquicoccus
